item.title: Lecture 6
item.description: Lecture 6 Video : C Part 3 IO Slides : C Part 3 IO Assignment Read Pointers on C, 15.8, 15.8.1, 15.10 through 15.10.4 inclusive. I/O No standard Input/Output defined in language, use <stdio.h>. Linux/Unix use ASCII, course will also use ASCII. Character I/O Return integer ASCII characters. Must be cast to char or printed with "%c". Can return EOF. int getchar(void) int putchar(int) int scanf(char const *format, $params.
